mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NNUM, NSUBJECT, NWRITER, NCONTENTS, NFILE, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES( #{nnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nsubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nwriter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncontents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NNUM NNUM ,A.NSUBJECT NSUBJECT ,A.NFILE NFILE ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.NNUM)/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) pageSize ,COUNT(A.NNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM NOTICE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC
) WHERE pageSize = #{curPage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.NNUM NNUM ,A.NSUBJECT NSUBJECT ,A.NWRITER NWRITER ,A.NCONTENTS NCONTENTS ,A.NFILE NFILE ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM NOTICE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.NNUM NNUM ,A.NSUBJECT NSUBJECT ,A.NWRITER NWRITER ,A.NCONTENTS NCONTENTS ,A.NFILE NFILE ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM NOTICE A WHERE A.DELETEYN='Y' AND A.NNUM = #{nnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET DELETEYN = 'N', UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND NNUM = #{nnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
